## TextAndEncoding interface

An object containing some encoded text in a `Buffer`<!-- -->, along with the encoding used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TextAndEncoding 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [encoding](./iconv-corefoundation.textandencoding.encoding.md) | <code>StringEncoding</code> | The encoding of the <code>text</code>. |
